Key Match Events: Malik Beasley produced 20 points to lead the Pistons’ starting five in scoring for the night.
Cade Cunningham collected a double-double by dishing out ten assists.
Detroit avoided overtime and collected a tight 99-95 win.
Pre-Game Insights: The Pistons replaced the injured Tim Hardaway Jr with the veteran Malik Beasley.
The Raptors have been struggling and have been undermanned.
